magicbook.gtlitecore.api.utils.stream

类 LazyStreams

  • java.lang.Object
    • magicbook.gtlitecore.api.utils.stream.LazyStreams

  • public final class LazyStreams
extends java.lang.Object
    A lazy and short-circuit stream related utilities class, this class is based on common stream and StreamEx, provided some methods to reduce same code usage.

    This class also consists of some functional interface which used for stream contexts, and its implementation (it is completed at this class yet).

    • Gatherer<T, R>: A fast intermediate operator for stream, can gather input elements and do consume to a downstream.
    作者:
    Magic_Sweepy

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  LazyStreams.Gatherer<T,R>
      A stateful intermediate transformation for input elements in a stream that can emit zero to more transformed elements to downstream consumers.
      protected static class  LazyStreams.GathererSpliterator<T,R>

      Generated a sorted list for a given object2ObjectMap.entrySet().
      <T,R> java.util.stream.Stream<R> gather(java.util.stream.Stream<T> source, LazyStreams.Gatherer<T,R> gatherer) 
      static <T> LazyStreams.Gatherer<T,java.util.List<T>> windowSliding(int windowSize)
      LazyStreams.gather(Stream.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5), windowSliding(3)) .forEach(System.out::println) // Will output: // [1, 2, 3] // [2, 3, 4] // [3, 4, 5]

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LazyStreams

    • 方法详细资料

      • fastSortedByKey

        public static <K,V> java.util.List<K> fastSortedByKey(it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.AbstractObject2ObjectMap<K,V> object2ObjectMap)
        Generated a sorted list for a given object2ObjectMap.entrySet().

        Will sorted all elements in entry set by AbstractStreamEx.sortedByInt(ToIntFunction), this method is a lazy importing of WrappedIntTier.

        类型参数:
        K - The type of key in object2ObjectMap.
        V - The type of value in object2ObjectMap.
        参数:
        object2ObjectMap - Any (object, object) map, will use its entry set.
        返回:
        The sorted key list.
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - When the correspondenced types of MetaBlock at <K> is not the implementation of WrappedIntTier.

      • fastSortedByKey

        public static <K,V> java.util.List<K> fastSortedByKey(it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2ObjectMap<K,V> object2ObjectMap)
        Generated a sorted list for a given object2ObjectMap.entrySet().

        Will sorted all elements in entry set by AbstractStreamEx.sortedByInt(ToIntFunction), this method is a lazy importing of IHeatingCoilBlockStats.

        This method is a special version for all tiered stats stored at GregTechAPI, because these stats are initialize with Object2ObjectMap, but not the default choice Object2ObjectOpenHashMap of GTLiteAPI.

        参数:
        object2ObjectMap - Any (object, object) map, will use its entry set.
        返回:
        The sorted key list.
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - When the correspondenced types of MetaBlock at <K> is not the implementation of IHeatingCoilBlockStats.

      • gather

        public <T,R> java.util.stream.Stream<R> gather(java.util.stream.Stream<T> source,
                                               LazyStreams.Gatherer<T,R> gatherer)
        类型参数:
        T - The type of input elements.
        R - The type of output elements.
        参数:
        source - The upstream stream which consists of input elements.
        gatherer - The gatherer.
        返回:
        Transformed stream which consists of output elements of gatherer.

      • windowSliding

        public static <T> LazyStreams.Gatherer<T,java.util.List<T>> windowSliding(int windowSize)
        
     LazyStreams.gather(Stream.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),  windowSliding(3))
                .forEach(System.out::println)
     // Will output:
     // [1, 2, 3]
     // [2, 3, 4]
     // [3, 4, 5]
